interaction = { 
	key = UPDOWN_1
	random_seed = random
	cooldown_months = 0
	trigger = { 
		hidden_trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		hidden_trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbu
						value = 0
					}
				}
				adm_power = 150
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ati
							value = 15
						}
						AND = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									always = yes
								}
								custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
									tooltip = Advisor_HasBU1
									OR = { 
										ai = yes
										philosopher_BU = 1
										natural_scientist_BU = 1
										artist_BU = 1
										treasurer_BU = 1
										master_of_mint_BU = 1
										statesman_BU = 1
										naval_reformer_BU = 1
										spymaster_BU = 1
										colonial_governor_BU = 1
										diplomat_BU = 1
										navigator_BU = 1
										army_reformer_BU = 1
										army_organiser_BU = 1
										commandant_BU = 1
										quartermaster_BU = 1
										recruitmaster_BU = 1
										fortification_expert_BU = 1
										grand_captain_BU = 1
										alderman_BU = 1
										architect_BU = 1
										high_judge_BU = 1
										collector_BU = 1
										sheriff_BU = 1
										grand_admiral_BU = 1
										lord_proprietor_BU = 1
										astronomist_BU = 1
										rear_admiral_BU = 1
										colonel_BU = 1
										composer_BU = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									ai = yes
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_S
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_M
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_L
								}
							}
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_BU
								influence = 30
							}
							AND = { 
								ai = yes
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_BU
									influence = 10
								}
								check_variable = { 
									which = ati
									value = 10
								}
								AND = { 
									NOT = { 
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
									}
									NOT = { 
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_L
									}
								}
							}
						}
						custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
							tooltip = Privilege_BUFarm1HasGreater
							check_variable = { 
								which = noi
								value = 1
							}
						}
						check_variable = { 
							which = bba
							value = -1
						}
						NOT = { 
							custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
								tooltip = Privilege_NOAutonomy5HasGreater
								check_variable = { 
									which = kid
									value = 5
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = bbu
							value = 1
						}
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = bbw
							value = 2
						}
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = bby
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				adm_power = 250
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ati
							value = 60
						}
						AND = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									always = yes
								}
								custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
									tooltip = Advisor_HasBU1
									OR = { 
										ai = yes

										natural_scientist_BU = 1

								influence = 30

									faction = FC_BU
									influence = 10
								}
								check_variable = { 
									which = ati
									value = 10
								}
								AND = { 
									NOT = { 
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
									}
									NOT = { 
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_L
									}
								}
							}
						}
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = bbw
							value = 2
						}
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = bby
							value = 2
						}
						custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
							tooltip = Privilege_BUCourts2HasGreater
							check_variable = {

				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbu
						value = 2
					}
				}
				adm_power = 250
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						has_institution = Academia
						check_variable = { 
							which = ati
							value = 75

										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L

										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L

					always = no

	effect = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_ReformCD
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbu
					value = 0
				}
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = ati
						value = 15
					}
					AND = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}
							custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
								tooltip = Advisor_HasBU1
								OR = { 
									ai = yes
									philosopher_BU = 1
									natural_scientist_BU = 1
									artist_BU = 1
									treasurer_BU = 1
									master_of_mint_BU = 1
									statesman_BU = 1
									naval_reformer_BU = 1
									spymaster_BU = 1
									colonial_governor_BU = 1
									diplomat_BU = 1
									navigator_BU = 1
									army_reformer_BU = 1
									army_organiser_BU = 1
									commandant_BU = 1
									quartermaster_BU = 1
									recruitmaster_BU = 1
									fortification_expert_BU = 1
									grand_captain_BU = 1
									alderman_BU = 1

									high_judge_BU = 1

									rear_admiral_BU = 1
									colonel_BU = 1

					}

								has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_S
								has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_M

							}
						}

							influence = 30

								faction = FC_BU
								influence = 10

									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_L

									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L

									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L

									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L

									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L

							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = bdu
											value = -100
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdu
									value = -100
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = bdu
										value = 100.001
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdu
									value = 100
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = 0.001
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = 1000
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}
							custom_tooltip = BU_RelationState_15
						}
					}
				}
				else = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							always = yes
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = 18
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = bdu
											value = -100
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdu
									value = -100
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = bdu
										value = 100.001
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdu
									value = 100
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = 0.001
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = 1000
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}
							custom_tooltip = BU_RelationState_18
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ati
								value = 20
							}
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = -300
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									stability = 3
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
							}
							else = { 
								subtract_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
								add_stability = 1
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ahf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										stability = -2
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
								add_stability = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahd
							which = ahf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = ahd
							value = 12
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ahd
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ahd
							value = 10
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = lsc
							value = 100
						}
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = lsc
							which = ahd
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract25
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_emperor_of_china = yes
						}
						add_mandate = -1
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = bam
					value = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ban
					value = 5
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = Prov_React.001
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			add_adm_power = -200
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					stability = 1
				}
				stability = -1
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LowStab
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bav
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baw
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bay
					value = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = NO_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = BG_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = TR_ReformMoodDispleased
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					stability = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_BadStab
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bav
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baw
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bay
					value = -3
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = NO_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = BG_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = TR_ReformMoodAngry
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = Rights.001
			}
		}
	}
	ai_will_do = { 
		factor = 0
	}
}

interaction = { 
	key = UPDOWN_4
	random_seed = random
	cooldown_months = 0
	trigger = { 
		hidden_trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		hidden_trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bca
						value = 0
					}
				}
				mil_power = 150
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							NOT = { 
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_NO
									influence = 40
								}
							}
						}
						check_variable = { 
							which = ati
							value = 10
						}
						check_variable = { 
							which = bbg
							value = 0
						}

							tooltip = Privilege_BUStructure1HasGreater
							check_variable = { 
								which = noq
								value = 1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bca
						value = 1
					}
				}
				mil_power = 200
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ati
							value = 35
						}

							tooltip = Privilege_BUStructure2HasGreater
							check_variable = { 
								which = noq
								value = 2
							}
						}
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									ai = yes
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_S
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_M
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_L
								}
							}
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_BU
								influence = 30
							}
							AND = { 
								ai = yes
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_BU
									influence = 10
								}
								check_variable = { 
									which = ati
									value = 10
								}
								AND = { 
									NOT = { 
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
									}

								hidden_effect = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = hxl
										value = -1
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = hxl
													value = -5
												}
											}
										}
										set_variable = { 
											which = hxl
											value = -5
										}
									}
									else_if = { 
										limit = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = hxl
												value = 5.001
											}
										}
										set_variable = { 
											which = hxl
											value = 5
										}
									}
									multiply_variable = { 
										which = hxl
										value = 0.001
									}
									multiply_variable = { 
										which = hxl
										value = 1000
									}
								}
							}
						}
						else = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									always = yes
								}
								hidden_effect = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = bdt
										value = -5
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = bdt
													value = -100
												}
											}
										}
										set_variable = { 
											which = bdt
											value = -100
										}
									}
									else_if = { 
										limit = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = bdt
												value = 100.001
											}
										}
										set_variable = { 
											which = bdt
											value = 100
										}
									}
									multiply_variable = { 
										which = bdt
										value = 0.001
									}
									multiply_variable = { 
										which = bdt
										value = 1000
									}
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										always = yes
									}
									custom_tooltip = TR_RelationState_-5
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_adm_power = -10
				add_dip_power = -10
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_BU
							influence = 50
						}
					}
					if = {

								which = bdu
								value = 12
							}

									NOT = {

									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdu
									value = -100
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = bdu
										value = 100.001
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdu
									value = 100
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = 0.001
							}
							multiply_variable = {

								value = 1000
							}
						}
						if = {

								always = yes

					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_BU
							influence = 10
						}

						limit = {

						NOT = {

								which = ati
								value = 20
							}
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = -300
						}
						if = { 
							limit = {

									which = ahf
									value = 1200

								limit = { 
									stability = 3

									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
							}
							else = { 
								subtract_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}

							}

							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									check_variable = {

										value = 0
									}
								}

									value = 0
								}
							}
							else = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
								add_stability = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahd
							which = ahf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = ahd
							value = 12
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ahd
							value = 0.1
						}

							which = ahd
							value = 10
						}

							value = 100
						}

							which = ahd
						}

					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_emperor_of_china = yes
						}

					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = bam
					value = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ban
					value = 5
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = Prov_React.001
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			add_mil_power = -300
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					stability = 1
				}
				stability = -1
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LowStab

				change_variable = { 
					which = bav
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baw
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bay
					value = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = NO_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = BG_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = TR_ReformMoodDispleased
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					stability = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_BadStab
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = {

				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD

					}

				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbu
					value = 2
				}
				NOT = {

						influence = 30
					}
				}

			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Success

					}

			}

				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = bbw
							value = 1
						}
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = bbu
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				adm_power = 100
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					NOT = { 
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_BU
							influence = 30
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = bbw
							value = 2
						}
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = bbu
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				adm_power = 100
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					NOT = { 
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_BU
							influence = 30
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_NotAvail
					always = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
	effect = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_ReformCD
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbw
						value = 1
					}
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbu
						value = 1
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_BU
						influence = 30
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Success
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbw
						value = 2
					}
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbu
						value = 1
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_BU
						influence = 30
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Success
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Failed
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbw
						value = 1
					}
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbu
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_NoneOf
			custom_tooltip = POP_BUNotHasInfluence_30
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_BUDir1Lower_description
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbw
					value = 0
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bbx
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baz
					value = 2
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = bci
							value = 2
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = bci
						value = 1
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = bcg
					value = 0
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			add_adm_power = -100
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbw
						value = 2
					}
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbu
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_NoneOf
			custom_tooltip = POP_BUNotHasInfluence_30
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_BUDir2Lower_description
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbw
					value = 1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bbx
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baz
					value = 2
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = bcf
					value = 0
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			add_adm_power = -100
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					stability = 1
				}
				stability = -1
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LowStab
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bav
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baw
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bay
					value = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = NO_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = BG_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = TR_ReformMoodDispleased
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					stability = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_BadStab
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bav
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baw
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bay
					value = -3
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = NO_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = BG_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = TR_ReformMoodAngry
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = Rights.001
			}
		}
	}
	ai_will_do = { 
		factor = 0
	}
}

interaction = { 
	key = UPDOWN_8
	random_seed = random
	cooldown_months = 0
	trigger = { 
		hidden_trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		hidden_trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bca
						value = 1
					}
				}
				mil_power = 75
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									ai = yes
									has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_S
									has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_M
									has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_L
								}
							}
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_NO
								influence = 30
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = bbg
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bca
						value = 2
					}
				}
				mil_power = 100
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					NOT = { 
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_BU
							influence = 30
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bca
						value = 3
					}
				}
				mil_power = 100
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					NOT = { 
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_BU
							influence = 30
						}
					}

			}

		}

			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bca
					value = 1
				}

					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								ai = yes
								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_S
								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_M
								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_L
							}
						}
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_NO
							influence = 30
						}

							which = bbg
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Success
		}

interaction = { 
	key = PieChart_WealthShare
	random_seed = random
	cooldown_months = 0
	trigger = { 
		hidden_trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
	}
	effect = { 
		clr_country_flag = PieChart_View_ResourceShare
		clr_country_flag = PieChart_View_UrbanShare
		clr_country_flag = PieChart_View_FactionInfluence
		clr_country_flag = PieChart_View_WealthShare
		set_country_flag = PieChart_View_WealthShare
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = POP_Census.9921

interaction = { 
	key = UPDOWN_9
	random_seed = random
	cooldown_months = 0
	trigger = { 
		hidden_trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		hidden_trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bba
						value = -2
					}
				}
				adm_power = 100
				mil_power = 100
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = asn
								value = 90
							}
						}
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										always = yes
									}
									custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
										tooltip = Advisor_HasBU1
										OR = { 
											ai = yes
											philosopher_BU = 1
											natural_scientist_BU = 1
											artist_BU = 1
											treasurer_BU = 1
											master_of_mint_BU = 1
											statesman_BU = 1
											naval_reformer_BU = 1
											spymaster_BU = 1
											colonial_governor_BU = 1
											diplomat_BU = 1
											navigator_BU = 1
											army_reformer_BU = 1
											army_organiser_BU = 1
											commandant_BU = 1
											quartermaster_BU = 1
											recruitmaster_BU = 1
											fortification_expert_BU = 1
											grand_captain_BU = 1
											alderman_BU = 1
											architect_BU = 1
											high_judge_BU = 1
											collector_BU = 1
											sheriff_BU = 1
											grand_admiral_BU = 1
											lord_proprietor_BU = 1
											astronomist_BU = 1
											rear_admiral_BU = 1
											colonel_BU = 1
											composer_BU = 1
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									ai = yes
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_S
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_M
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_L
								}
							}
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_BU
								influence = 30
							}
							NOT = { 
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_NO
									influence = 40
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								ai = yes
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_BU
									influence = 10
								}
								check_variable = { 
									which = ati
									value = 10
								}
								AND = { 
									NOT = { 
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M

interaction = { 
	key = UPDOWN_10
	random_seed = random
	cooldown_months = 0
	trigger = { 
		hidden_trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		hidden_trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbc
						value = -1
					}
				}
				dip_power = 100

						OR = {

								OR = { 
									ai = yes

									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_M
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_L
								}
							}

								faction = FC_BU

									custom_tooltip = TR_RelationState_-5
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_adm_power = -10
				add_dip_power = -10
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_BU
							influence = 50
						}
					}

							always = yes

							change_variable = { 
								which = bdu

											which = bdu

										}
									}

									which = bdu
									value = -100
								}
							}

									check_variable = { 
										which = bdu

									}

					}

interaction = { 
	key = UPDOWN_13
	random_seed = random
	cooldown_months = 0
	trigger = { 
		hidden_trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		hidden_trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbi
						value = -4
					}
				}
				adm_power = 200
				dip_power = 200
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ass
							value = 5
						}
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									ai = yes
									has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_S
									has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_M
									has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_L
								}
							}
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_BG
								influence = 10
							}
							AND = { 
								ai = yes
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_BG
									influence = 5
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbi
						value = -3
					}
				}
				adm_power = 100
				dip_power = 100
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ass
							value = 10
						}
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									ai = yes
									has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_S
									has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_M
									has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_L
								}
							}
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_BG
								influence = 15
							}
							AND = { 
								ai = yes
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_BG
									influence = 5
								}
							}
						}
						OR = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ass
								value = 15
							}

	key = UPDOWN_16
	random_seed = random
	cooldown_months = 0
	trigger = { 
		hidden_trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		hidden_trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbc
						value = 0
					}
				}
				dip_power = 100
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs

						OR = { 
							AND = {

									ai = yes
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_S

									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_L

							}

								faction = FC_BU
								influence = 30
							}
							AND = { 
								ai = yes

									faction = FC_BU
									influence = 10
								}
								check_variable = { 
									which = ati
									value = 10
								}
								AND = { 
									NOT = { 
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L

										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
									}
									NOT = { 
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_L

										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_L
									}
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								OR = {

							custom_tooltip = BU_RelationState_15
						}
					}
				}
				else = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							always = yes
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = 18
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = bdu
											value = -100
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdu
									value = -100
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = bdu
										value = 100.001
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdu
									value = 100
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = 0.001
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = 1000
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}
							custom_tooltip = BU_RelationState_18
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ati
								value = 20
							}
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = -300
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									stability = 3
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
							}
							else = { 
								subtract_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
								add_stability = 1
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ahf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										stability = -2
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 0
								}
							}
							else = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
								add_stability = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahd
							which = ahf
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = ahd
							value = 12
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ahd
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ahd
							value = 10
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = lsc
							value = 100
						}
						subtract_variable = { 
							which = lsc
							which = ahd
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract25
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_emperor_of_china = yes
						}
						add_mandate = -1
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = bam
					value = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ban
					value = 5
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = Prov_React.001
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			add_dip_power = -100
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					stability = 1
				}
				stability = -1
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LowStab
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bav
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baw
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bay
					value = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = NO_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = BG_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = TR_ReformMoodDispleased
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					stability = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_BadStab
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bav
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baw
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bay
					value = -3
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = NO_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = BG_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = TR_ReformMoodAngry
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = Rights.001
			}
		}
	}
	ai_will_do = { 
		factor = 0
	}
}

	key = UPDOWN_20
	random_seed = random
	cooldown_months = 0
	trigger = { 
		hidden_trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		hidden_trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbk
						value = -1
					}
				}
				adm_power = 150
				dip_power = 50
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs

						OR = {

						}
					}
					NOT = { 
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_BG
							influence = 30
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Success
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Failed
		}

			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbk
					value = -1
				}

					which = bbk

				}
			}

				change_variable = { 
					which = bbl

					value = 3

interaction = { 
	key = UPDOWN_21
	random_seed = random
	cooldown_months = 0
	trigger = { 
		hidden_trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		hidden_trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbo
						value = -1
					}
				}
				adm_power = 250
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = asx
								value = 65
							}
						}
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							NOT = { 
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_CL
									influence = 30
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbo
						value = 0
					}
				}
				adm_power = 250
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = asx
								value = 55
							}
						}
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							NOT = { 
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_CL
									influence = 30
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_NotAvail
					always = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
	effect = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_ReformCD
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbo
					value = -1
				}
				AND = { 
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 65
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						ai = yes
						NOT = { 
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_CL
								influence = 30
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Success
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbo
					value = 0
				}
				AND = { 
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 55
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						ai = yes
						NOT = { 
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_CL
								influence = 30
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Success
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Failed
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbo
					value = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_NoneOf
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLNotHasPow_65
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLNotHasInfluence_30
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_CLHie2Raise_description
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbo
					value = 0
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bbp
					value = 1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baz
					value = 5
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -5
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodFurious
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			add_adm_power = -250
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbo
					value = 0
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_NoneOf
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLNotHasPow_55
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLNotHasInfluence_30
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_CLHie3Raise_description
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbo
					value = 1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bbp
					value = 1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baz
					value = 5
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -5
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodFurious
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			add_adm_power = -250
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					stability = 1
				}
				stability = -1
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LowStab
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bav
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baw
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bay
					value = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = NO_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = BG_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = TR_ReformMoodDispleased
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					stability = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_BadStab
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bav
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baw
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bay
					value = -3
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = NO_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = BG_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = TR_ReformMoodAngry
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = Rights.001
			}
		}
	}
	ai_will_do = { 
		factor = 0
	}
}

	key = UPDOWN_22
	random_seed = random
	cooldown_months = 0
	trigger = { 
		hidden_trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		hidden_trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}

				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbs
						value = -1
					}
				}
				adm_power = 100
				dip_power = 100
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = asx
								value = 75
							}
						}
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							NOT = { 
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_CL
									influence = 30
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbs
						value = 0
					}
				}
				adm_power = 100
				dip_power = 100
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = asx
								value = 55
							}
						}
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							NOT = { 
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_CL
									influence = 30
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_NotAvail
					always = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
	effect = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_ReformCD
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbs
					value = -1
				}
				AND = { 
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 75
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						ai = yes
						NOT = { 
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_CL
								influence = 30
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Success
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbs
					value = 0
				}
				AND = { 
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 55
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						ai = yes
						NOT = { 
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_CL
								influence = 30
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Success
		}
		else = {

		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbs
					value = -1
				}
			}

			custom_tooltip = POP_CLNotHasInfluence_30

					which = bbs
					value = 0
				}
			}

				change_variable = { 
					which = bbt
					value = 1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baz
					value = 4
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -4
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB

			add_dip_power = -100

					which = bbs

				}

				change_variable = { 
					which = bax

					which = bay
					value = -1

			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodDispleased

interaction = { 
	key = UPDOWN_23
	random_seed = random
	cooldown_months = 0
	trigger = { 
		hidden_trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		hidden_trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbq
						value = -1
					}
				}
				adm_power = 150
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = asx
								value = 75
							}
						}
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							NOT = { 
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_CL
									influence = 30
								}
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									always = yes
								}
								custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
									tooltip = Advisor_HasBU1
									OR = { 
										ai = yes
										philosopher_BU = 1
										natural_scientist_BU = 1
										artist_BU = 1
										treasurer_BU = 1
										master_of_mint_BU = 1
										statesman_BU = 1
										naval_reformer_BU = 1
										spymaster_BU = 1
										colonial_governor_BU = 1
										diplomat_BU = 1
										navigator_BU = 1
										army_reformer_BU = 1
										army_organiser_BU = 1
										commandant_BU = 1
										quartermaster_BU = 1
										recruitmaster_BU = 1
										fortification_expert_BU = 1
										grand_captain_BU = 1
										alderman_BU = 1
										architect_BU = 1
										high_judge_BU = 1
										collector_BU = 1
										sheriff_BU = 1
										grand_admiral_BU = 1
										lord_proprietor_BU = 1
										astronomist_BU = 1
										rear_admiral_BU = 1
										colonel_BU = 1
										composer_BU = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = bbq
						value = 0
					}
				}
				adm_power = 250
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_MetReqs
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = asx
								value = 65
							}
						}
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							NOT = { 
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_CL
									influence = 30
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_NotAvail
					always = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
	effect = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_ReformCD
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbq
					value = -1
				}
				AND = { 
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 75
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						ai = yes
						NOT = { 
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_CL
								influence = 30
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}
							custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
								tooltip = Advisor_HasBU1
								OR = { 
									ai = yes

									natural_scientist_BU = 1
									artist_BU = 1

									master_of_mint_BU = 1

									naval_reformer_BU = 1

									colonial_governor_BU = 1
									diplomat_BU = 1

									army_reformer_BU = 1
									army_organiser_BU = 1
									commandant_BU = 1
									quartermaster_BU = 1
									recruitmaster_BU = 1
									fortification_expert_BU = 1

									alderman_BU = 1
									architect_BU = 1
									high_judge_BU = 1
									collector_BU = 1
									sheriff_BU = 1
									grand_admiral_BU = 1
									lord_proprietor_BU = 1
									astronomist_BU = 1
									rear_admiral_BU = 1
									colonel_BU = 1
									composer_BU = 1
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbq
					value = 0
				}

					}

		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Failed
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbq
					value = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_NoneOf
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLNotHasPow_75
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLNotHasInfluence_30
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_AllOf
			custom_tooltip = Reqs_HasBUStatesman

			custom_tooltip = Rights_CLTax2Raise_description
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbq
					value = 0
				}
			}

				change_variable = { 
					which = bbr
					value = 1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baz
					value = 4
				}
			}

				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -4
				}
			}

		}

					value = 0
				}
			}

				}

			}

			custom_tooltip = Rights_LowStab

				}

				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -1
				}

					which = bay
					value = -1
				}

			}

								}
							}
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_CL
								influence = 30
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Rights_UI_NotAvail
					always = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
	effect = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_ReformCD
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbs
					value = 0
				}
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = asx
						value = 15
					}
					AND = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}
							custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
								tooltip = Advisor_HasCL1
								OR = { 
									ai = yes
									cardinal_CL = 1
									philosopher_CL = 1
									theologian_CL = 1
									inquisitor_CL = 1
									statesman_CL = 1
									diplomat_CL = 1
									army_reformer_CL = 1
									fortification_expert_CL = 1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								ai = yes
								has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_S
								has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_M
								has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_L
							}
						}
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_CL
							influence = 30
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Success
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbs
					value = 1
				}
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = asx
						value = 5
					}
					AND = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}
							custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
								tooltip = Advisor_HasCL1
								OR = { 
									ai = yes
									cardinal_CL = 1
									philosopher_CL = 1
									theologian_CL = 1
									inquisitor_CL = 1
									statesman_CL = 1
									diplomat_CL = 1
									army_reformer_CL = 1
									fortification_expert_CL = 1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								ai = yes
								has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_S
								has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_M
								has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_L
							}
						}
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_CL
							influence = 30
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Success
		}
		else = { 
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_Failed
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbs
					value = 0
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_AllOf
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLHasPow_15
			custom_tooltip = Reqs_HasCLStatesman
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLHasInfluence_30
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_CLObl1Lower_description
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbs
					value = -1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bbt
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baz
					value = 3
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = 3
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodHappy
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			add_adm_power = -100
			add_dip_power = -100
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = bbs
					value = 1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_AllOf
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLHasPow_5
			custom_tooltip = Reqs_HasCLStatesman
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLHasInfluence_30
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB

			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbs
					value = 0
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bbt
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baz
					value = 3
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = 3
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodHappy
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			add_adm_power = -100
			add_dip_power = -100
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					stability = 1
				}
				stability = -1
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LowStab
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bav
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baw
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bay
					value = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = NO_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = BG_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodDispleased
			custom_tooltip = TR_ReformMoodDispleased
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					stability = -1
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Rights_BadStab
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = bav
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = baw
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bax
					value = -3
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = bay
					value = -3
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = NO_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = BG_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = CL_ReformMoodAngry
			custom_tooltip = TR_ReformMoodAngry
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = Rights.001
			}
		}
	}
	ai_will_do = { 
		factor = 0
	}
}

	key = UPDOWN_26
	random_seed = random
	cooldown_months = 0

		hidden_trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}

			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Reform_CD
			}

				limit = { 
					is_variable_equal = {

						value = 0
					}
